title: Tell Chuēra/Harbe
description: Tell Chuēra, a settlement in northern Syria inhabited from the fourth to third millennia BCE. A small settlement, called Harbe, was built on the site during the Middle Assyrian period.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the Tell Chuera site, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node.
properties.title: OSM location of تل ضهر الشويرة
